content.content:
Currantly development is in progress, how ever we share our early alpha versions with you. We update closly every day at the moment.

Changelog 0.6

  • added chaching
  • added rewriting via .htacess
  • scroll bug on chrome fixed

Changelog 0.5

  • added images to "newelelment" selection
  • scrollbug - on change something page has jumped up to top every time

Changelog 0.4

  • fixed bug, on adding multiple elements, old elments where reset
  • integrate filemanager to ckeditor

Changelog 0.3

  • added headline element
  • added description for gally images
  • element gallery is now responsive(r) it breaks with mediaquerys
  • uploader changed, create a gallery thump

Changelog 0.2

  • added code element
  • layout changes
